description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5fq7j","text":"The following protocol describes the preparation of serum and plasma samples for non-targeted analysis by mass spectrometry coupled to liquid or gas chromatography, as proposed by the PFEM (MetaboHUB-Clermont).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
